title: Informal anymade cafe font
content:
Hi everyone! this is my first post here and I was wondering if anyone knew this font?  
 [https://www.behance.net/gallery/17329881/The-Informal-Anymade-Cafe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/17329881/The-Informal-Anymade-Cafe "https://www.behance.net/gallery/17329881/The-Informal-Anymade-Cafe")

The font that I need to know is the one in this picture (on the business card)  
thankyou for your time!

Font: 

 Novecento Sans 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: Thompson98

comments.content:
Perhaps: Young by Scott Simpson.  
 [http://www.dafont.com/young.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639/http:/www.dafont.com/young.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/formal1_4908.jpg)
  
Or: Font Face/Novecentowide-Medium  
or [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/normal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synthview/novecento/normal/)
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317212639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/formal2_5211.jpg)
Thankyou so much! it looks like the bottom one. That was so fast!
